text: Shǐzhě [mù shèng] quèxìn cóng tā de zhǔ jiàng shì tā de jīngdiǎn [“gǔlánjīng”], xìnshìmen yě yīyàng, quánbù xìnyǎng ān lā, tiānshǐmen, jīngdiǎn hé shǐzhěmen.[Tāmen shuō]:“Wǒmen jué bù qíshì tā de shǐzhě zhōng de rènhé yī wèi.” Tāmen shuō:“Wǒmen tīngjiànle, wǒmen fúcóngle. Wǒmen de zhǔ a! Wǒmen qíqiú nǐ de kuānshù, wéi nǐ shì [wǒmen] zuìhòu de guīsù.”
